flavorText: One must reap before one can sow.

foreignData.name: Überlagertes Gebiet
foreignData.text:
Opfere alle Länder unter Deiner Kontrolle als zusätzliche Kosten, um Überlagertes Gebiet zu spielen.
Alle Länder, die Du kontrollierst, haben "{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um zwei Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."

name: Overlaid Terrain
originalText:
As Overlaid Terrain comes into play, sacrifice all lands you control.
Lands you control have "oc
T: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."

rulings.text: You sacrifice your lands right before this card enters the battlefield. There is no way to tap your lands using the 2-mana ability before they are sacrificed.

text:

Lands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."
